001package src.pkg_models;
002import src.pkg_items.Beamer;
003import src.pkg_rooms.Room;
004import src.pkg_items.ItemList;
005import src.pkg_items.Item;
006import java.util.Stack;
007/**
008 * Represents a player in the game.
009 *
010 * @author Pierre MATAR
011 
012 */
013public class Player
014{
015    private Stack<Room> aItinerary;
016    private Room aCurrentRoom;
017    private String aName;
018    private ItemList aItems;
019    private int aWeight;
020    private int aNbMoves;
021    private Beamer aBeamer;
022    private final int NB_MAX_MOVES = 30;
023    
024    
025      /**
026     * Constructs a new Player with the given name.
027     * Initializes the player's items list, weight, and number of moves.
028     * 
029     * @param pName The name of the player.
030     */
031    public Player(final String pName) {
032        this.aName = pName;
033        this.aItems = new ItemList();
034        this.aWeight = 300;
035        this.aNbMoves = 0;
036        this.aItinerary = new Stack<Room>();
037    }
038       /**
039     * Sets the current room the player is in.
040     * 
041     * @param pRoom The room to set as the current room.
042     */
043    
044    public void setCurrentRoom(final Room pRoom) {
045        this.aCurrentRoom = pRoom;
046    }
047      /**
048     * Returns the current room the player is in.
049     * 
050     * @return The current room.
051     */
052    public Room getCurrentRoom() {
053        return this.aCurrentRoom;
054    }
055    
056    /**
057     * @return The maximum number of moves.
058     */
059    public int getMaxMoves() {
060        return this.NB_MAX_MOVES;
061    }
062    /**
063    
064     * @return The name of the player.
065     */
066    public String getName() {
067        return this.aName;
068    }
069
070    
071    /**
072     * @return The weight of the player.
073     */
074    public int getPlayerWeight() {
075        return this.aWeight;
076    }
077    
078    /**
079     * Sets the player's weight by adding the given weight.
080     * 
081     * @param pWeigth The weight to add to the player's current weight.
082     */
083    public void setPlayerWeight(final int pWeight) {
084        this.aWeight += pWeight;
085    }
086
087       /**
088     * Adds an item to the player's inventory.
089     * 
090     * @param pItem The item to add.
091     */
092    public void addItem(final Item pItem) {
093        this.aItems.addItem(pItem);
094    }
095       /**
096     * Returns an item from the player's inventory by name.
097     * 
098     * @param pItemName The name of the item.
099     * @return The item with the specified name.
100     */
101    public Item getItem(final String pItemName) {
102        return this.aItems.getItem(pItemName);
103    }
104    
105    
106    /**
107     * Removes an item from the player's inventory by name.
108     * 
109     * @param pItemName The name of the item to remove.
110     */
111    public void removeItem(final String pItemName) {
112        this.aItems.removeItem(pItemName);
113    }
114    
115    /**
116     * Returns a list of all items in the player's inventory as a string.
117     * 
118     * @return The list of items in string format.
119     */
120    
121    public String getMyItemsList() {
122         return this.aItems.getAllItemString(this);
123    }
124     /**
125     * Increases the player's number of moves by one.
126     */
127    
128    public void addOneMove() {
129        this.aNbMoves += 1;
130    }
131    
132    /**
133     * @return The number of moves.
134     */
135    
136    public int getNbMoves() {
137        return this.aNbMoves;
138    }
139     /**
140     * @return The size of the itinerary.
141     */
142    public int getItinerarySize() {
143        return this.aItinerary.size();
144    }
145    
146      /**
147     * Adds a room to the player's itinerary.
148     * 
149     * @param pRoom The room to add.
150     */
151    public void addRoom(final Room pRoom) {
152        this.aItinerary.push(pRoom);
153    }
154        /**
155     * Returns the room at the specified index in the player's itinerary.
156     * 
157     * @param pIndex The index of the room to retrieve.
158     * @return The room at the specified index.
159     */
160    
161    public Room getRoom(final int pIndex) {
162        
163        return this.aItinerary.get(pIndex);
164    }
165    
166    /**
167     * Removes the top room from the player's itinerary.
168     */
169    
170    public void removeTopRoom() {
171        this.aItinerary.pop();
172    }
173    
174      /**
175     * Returns the top room from the player's itinerary.
176     * 
177     * @return The top room.
178     */
179    public Room getTopRoom() {
180        return this.aItinerary.peek();
181    }
182    
183      /**
184     * Clears the player's itinerary.
185     */
186    public void clearItinerary() {
187        this.aItinerary.clear();
188    }
189    
190    /**
191     * @return The room of the beamer.
192     */
193    public Room getBeamerRoom() {
194        return this.aBeamer.getRoom();
195    }
196    
197    /**
198     * Sets the room for the player's beamer.
199     * 
200     * @param pRoom The room to set for the beamer.
201     */
202    
203    public void setBeamerRoom(final Room pRoom) {
204        this.aBeamer.setRoom(pRoom);
205    }
206    
207    /**
208     * Sets the player's beamer.
209     * 
210     * @param pBeamer The beamer to set.
211     */
212    
213    public void setBeamer(final Beamer pBeamer) {
214        this.aBeamer = pBeamer;
215    }
216    
217    /**
218     * @return The player's beamer.
219     */
220    
221    public Beamer getBeamer() {
222        return this.aBeamer;
223    }
224    /**
225     * @return true if the number of max moves is reached, false otherwise.
226     */
227    public boolean isNbMaxMovesReached() {
228        return this.NB_MAX_MOVES == this.aNbMoves;
229    }
230}
